message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.
